text: lekin is tareeke par ki (usake haq mein) behatar ho yahaan tak ki vah apanee javaanee kee had ko pahunch jae aur insaaph ke saath naap aur taul pooree kiya karo ham kisee shakhs ko usakee taaqat se badhakar takaleeph nahin dete aur (chaahe kuchh ho magar) jab baat kaho to insaaf se agarache vah (jisake tum khilaaph na ho) tumhaara azeez hee (kyon na) ho aur khuda ke ehad va paigaam ko poora karo yah vah baaten hain jinaka khuda ne tumhe hukm diya hai ki tum ibarat haasil karo aur ye bhee (samajh lo) ki yahee mera seedha raasta hai
